author: Fox News
title: Hillary Clinton repeatedly suggests Donald Trump, Republicans enabling Putin aggression during MSNBC interview
description: Hillary Clinton repeatedly suggested during an MSNBC interview that former President Donald Trump and Republicans were responsible for Russian President Vladimir Putin's aggression against Ukraine.
content: Former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton repeatedly suggested during a Friday MSNBC interview that former President Donald Trump and members of the Republican Party were responsible for enabling Rusâ€¦ [+2507 chars]
